title: BashunzipCommand - Extract from ZIP archive

metadata.description: Learn about BashunzipCommand - Extract from ZIP archive with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title:
Bash
unzip
Command
content_sections.content:
- Extract from ZIP archive

Using the
unzip
Command
The
unzip
command is used to extract compressed files from a ZIP archive.
Basic Usage
To extract files from a ZIP archive, use
unzip archive.zip
:
Example
unzip archive.zip
Archive: archive.zip
inflating: file1
inflating: file2
Unzip Options Overview
Here are some common options you can use with the
unzip
command:
-l
- List archive files
-t
- Test compressed archive files
-d
- Extract files into a different directory
-o
- Overwrite existing files without prompting
-x
- Exclude specific files from being extracted
Option: -l (List)

content_sections.title: The
content_sections.content:
-l
option lists all the files in the ZIP archive without extracting them.
Example: List Files
unzip -l archive.zip

content_sections.title: The
content_sections.content:
-t
option tests the integrity of the files in the ZIP archive.
Example: Test Archive
unzip -t archive.zip
Archive: archive.zip
testing: file1 OK
testing: file2 OK
No errors detected in compressed data of archive.zip
Option: -d (Extract to Directory)

content_sections.title: The
content_sections.content:
-d
option extracts files to a specified directory.
Example: Extract to Directory
unzip -d /path/to/extract/ archive.zip
Archive: archive.zip
  inflating: /path/to/extract/file1
  inflating: /path/to/extract/file2
Option: -o (Overwrite)

content_sections.title: The
content_sections.content:
-o
option overwrites existing files without prompting.
Example: Overwrite Files
unzip -o archive.zip
Archive: archive.zip
replacing: file1
replacing: file2
Option: -x (Exclude)

content_sections.title: The
content_sections.content:
-x
option excludes specific files from being extracted.
Example: Exclude Files
unzip archive.zip -x file1
Archive: archive.zip
  inflating: file2

★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers BashunzipCommand - Extract from ZIP archive concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use BashunzipCommand - Extract from ZIP archive effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of BashunzipCommand - Extract from ZIP archive and how to apply it in your projects.
